remarks: Value of the conjugate of a complex number.  The value is the real part minus ` _i ` times the imaginary part.  Definition 10-3.2 of [Gleason] p. 132.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
statement:
recld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
remimd $p |- ( ph -> ( * ` A ) = ( ( Re ` A ) - ( _i x. ( Im ` A ) ) ) ) $.
